<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7885|שַׁיִט]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺט‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.28.15|Isa 28:15]]</sup> ==scourge, whip== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***mix, stir about and beat***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוֺטֶא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; from foregoing? compare German ***streifen***; or onomatopoetic, compare ***swish, switch***?); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> absolute [[Isa.10.26|Isa 10:26]] +, construct [[Job.5.21|Job 5:21]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.11|1Kgs 12:11]] +; — 

**1.** ***scourge***, for chastisement, [[1Kgs.12.11|1Kgs 12:11]]; [[1Kgs.12.14|1Kgs 12:14]] = [[2Chr.10.11|2Chr 10:11]]; [[2Chr.10.12|2Chr 10:12]] (all with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסַּר‎</span>); figurative of national scourge (wielded by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Isa.10.26|Isa 10:26]]; [[Isa.28.15|Isa 28:15]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; &gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁיט‎</span>), v[[Isa.28.18|Isa 28:18]] (both <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁטף‎</span>), calamity [[Job.9.23|Job 9:23]] ***lash*** of (accusing) tongue [[Job.5.21|Job 5:21]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשּׁ‎</span> as [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]). 

**2.** ***whip***, for horse, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל שׁ‎</span> [[Nah.3.2|Nah 3:2]] i.e. ***crack of whip***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַסּוּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Prov.26.3|Prov 26:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁבֶט לְגֵו כְּסִילִים‎</span>).
